text:
A large number of devotees offered worship to Sri Nithyakalyana Perumal here on Friday. The processional idol of Sri Perumal, in the form of Lord Siva, was taken around the temple.

Fishermen

plan agitation

Fishermen of eight districts have planned to launch a stir in front of the Sri Lankan Embassy office in Chennai on February 29, urging the Sri Lankan government to release all the Tamil Nadu fishermen arrested by Sri Lankan naval personnel. A decision to this effect was taken at a meeting of fishermen from these districts including Pudukottai, Nagapattinam, Tiruvarur, Ramanathapuram, Karaikal, Kanyakumari, and Thoothukudi.

Consecration

performed

The mahakumbabhishekam of Sri Meynindranathar – Sri Oppilamani temple at Keeranur near here was performed on Friday.

A large number of devotees witnessed the celebrations.
title: Large turnout at Karaikal
